body.p: This document contains the Feature Plan of the project.

ul.li: Move parameters tests to the discover module section.
Algorithm must be used without Workflow.
Add equals and hashcode methods for all objects(BioAssay, Annotation, ExperimentDesign...)
Create listeners and events for all biological objects(BioAssay, Annotation, ExperimentDesign...)
Finish wrappers for Genepix GPR and GAL.
Write object to handle GAL data.
Finish writing javascript annotation reader for Genepix data import.
BioAssay object setLocation with Genepix block numerotation
JAVA 5.0 : BioAssayBaseImpl use ArrayList<T> than array of ints, doubles or strings.
JAVA 5.0 : Next BioAssayBase version : use Collections.unmodifiableSet(Set s)
Create a thread safe version of bioAssayBase
Find memory leaks, find automaticaly bugs
New BioAssay transformation : concat 2 bioAssay object (columns or lines)
New BioAssay transformation : remove a list of column
Override all the toString() of all main biological objects.
Add HachCode and equals method for BioAssay and other objects
Add documentation and tests for new fields of BioAssay (Standard deviation)
Add documentation and tests for new filter (replicates, empty identifiers)
Add maven dependencies for web services and stats.
Interface TeMV algorithm with nividic algorithm.
